vine.platform.lwjgl3

Class GLFWDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • vine.platform.lwjgl3.GLFWDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Display

    public final class GLFWDisplay
extends Object
implements Display
    Implements a Display with the GLFW API. Doesn't work, if there is no GLFW window existing.
    Author:
    Steffen
